TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SuppressMessageAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SuppressMessageAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SuppressMessageAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 取消报告特定静态分析工具规则违规，并允许多次取消单个代码项目。

span.span: Suppresses reporting of a specific static analysis tool rule violation, allowing multiple suppressions on a single code artifact.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此特性可应用于任何应用程序元素。This attribute can be applied to any application element. 有关可取消的冲突的完整列表，请参阅[托管代码的代码分析警告](/visualstudio/code-quality/code-analysis-for-managed-code-warnings)。For a complete list of the violations that can be suppressed, see [Code Analysis for Managed Code Warnings](/visualstudio/code-quality/code-analysis-for-managed-code-warnings). > [!NOTE] > 将应用到此类，并将预处理符号 "CODE_ANALYSIS" 指定为条件符号，该符号可确定是包含还是省略属性调用。The is applied to this class, specifying the preprocessing symbol "CODE_ANALYSIS" as the conditional symbol that determines whether the attribute call is included or omitted. 如果定义了符号，则包含特性调用;否则，将忽略此调用。If the symbol is defined, the attribute call is included; otherwise, the call is omitted. > > 右键单击 Visual Studio 中的代码分析警告**错误列表**然后单击 "**禁止显示消息**" 时，将在代码中或项目的全局禁止显示文件中添加**SuppressMessage**特性。When you right-click a Code Analysis warning in the Visual Studio **Error List** and then click **Suppress Message(s)**, a **SuppressMessage** attribute is added either in your code or to the project's global suppressions file. 有关**SuppressMessage**属性及其在 Visual Studio 中的用法的详细信息，请参阅[源代码禁止显示概述](/visualstudio/code-quality/in-source-suppression-overview)。For more information about the **SuppressMessage** attribute and its use in Visual Studio, see [In Source Suppression Overview](/visualstudio/code-quality/in-source-suppression-overview). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 特性来取消显示性能警告消息。The following code example shows the use of the attribute to suppress performance warning messages. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/VB/program.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string category, string checkId) cil managed
Public Sub New (category As String, checkId As String)

param.name: checkId
param.span: 应用该属性的分析工具规则的标识符。

span.span: The identifier of the analysis tool rule the attribute applies to.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，同时指定静态分析工具的类别和分析规则的标识符。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the category of the static analysis tool and the identifier for an analysis rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `category` 参数值特定于分析工具，并对由 `checkId` 参数标识的规则进行分类。The `category` parameter value is specific to the analysis tool and categorizes the rule identified by the `checkId` parameter. 将两个参数连接在一起形成规则的唯一标识符。The two parameters concatenated together form a unique identifier for the rule. > [!NOTE] > 若要使此属性生效，必须定义预处理器符号 "CODE_ANALYSIS"。The preprocessor symbol "CODE_ANALYSIS" must be defined for this attribute to be effective. 缺少预处理器符号会导致不应用该属性。The absence of the preprocessor symbol results in the attribute not being applied. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 特性来取消 `Microsoft.Performance` 类别的警告和 `CA1801` 并 `CA1804` 检查标识符。The following code example shows the use of the attribute to suppress warnings for the `Microsoft.Performance` category and the `CA1801` and `CA1804` check identifiers. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/CS/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/VB/program.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取标识特性分类的类别。

span.span: Gets the category identifying the classification of the attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性描述用于应用消息隐藏属性的工具或工具分析类别。The property describes the tool or tool analysis category for which a message suppression attribute applies. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 特性来取消 `Microsoft.Performance` 类别的警告和 `CA1801` 并 `CA1804` 检查标识符。The following code example shows the use of the attribute to suppress warnings for the `Microsoft.Performance` category and the `CA1801` and `CA1804` check identifiers. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/CS/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/VB/program.vb#2)]

span.span: Gets the identifier of the static analysis tool rule to be suppressed.

value.span: 要取消的静态分析工具规则的标识符。

span.span: The identifier of the static analysis tool rule to be suppressed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 连接在一起后， 和 属性将形成一个唯一的检查标识符。Concatenated together, the and properties form a unique check identifier. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 特性来取消 `Microsoft.Performance` 类别的警告和 `CA1801` 并 `CA1804` 检查标识符。The following code example shows the use of the attribute to suppress warnings for the `Microsoft.Performance` category and the `CA1801` and `CA1804` check identifiers. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: Gets or sets the justification for suppressing the code analysis message.
The justification for suppressing the message.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MessageId { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MessageId : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置扩展排除条件的可选参数。

span.span: Gets or sets an optional argument expanding on exclusion criteria.

value.span: 一个包含扩展的排除条件的字符串。

span.span: A string containing the expanded exclusion criteria.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个可选参数，它指定文本元数据目标不够精确的附加排除项。The property is an optional argument that specifies additional exclusion where the literal metadata target is not sufficiently precise. 例如， 不能应用于方法中，因此可能需要针对方法中将导致规则冲突，而不是针对方法中的所有语句的语句禁止发生冲突。For example, the cannot be applied within a method, and it may be desirable to suppress a violation against a statement in the method that will give a rule violation, but not against all statements in the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 特性来取消方法声明中特定参数的警告和方法中的特定字段。The following code example shows the use of the attribute to suppress warnings for a specific parameter in a method declaration and a specific field in the method. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/CS/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/VB/program.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Scope { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Scope : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与属性相关的代码的范围。

span.span: Gets or sets the scope of the code that is relevant for the attribute.

value.span: 与属性相关的代码的范围。

span.span: The scope of the code that is relevant for the attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个可选参数，它指定属性相关的元数据作用域。The property is an optional argument that specifies the metadata scope for which the attribute is relevant. 托管元数据的可能值包括 "成员"、"资源"、"模块"、"类型"、"方法"、"命名空间" 或 "namespaceanddescendants" （自 Visual Studio 2019 起可用）。Possible values for managed metadata include "member", "resource", "module", "type", "method", "namespace", or "namespaceanddescendants" (available since Visual Studio 2019). 有关范围的详细信息，请参阅[取消显示代码分析警告](/visualstudio/code-quality/in-source-suppression-overview#suppressmessage-attribute)。For more information about scopes, see [Suppress code analysis warnings](/visualstudio/code-quality/in-source-suppression-overview#suppressmessage-attribute).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Target : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置表示属性目标的完全限定路径。

span.span: Gets or sets a fully qualified path that represents the target of the attribute.

value.span: 表示属性目标的完全限定路径。

span.span: A fully qualified path that represents the target of the attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个可选参数，用于标识特性的分析目标。The property is an optional argument identifying the analysis target of the attribute. 示例值为 "System.web. .ctor （）： System.void"。An example value is "System.IO.Stream.ctor():System.Void". 由于它是完全限定的，因此它可能很长，特别是对于参数等目标。Because it is fully qualified, it can be long, particularly for targets such as parameters. 分析工具用户界面应能够自动设置参数的格式。The analysis tool user interface should be capable of automatically formatting the parameter.
